name: An Aussie Saturday in Sydney
description:
G'Day!

I initially wrote this on a Saturday for "10 Day Themed Game Jam 7" which has the theme "Australia"! I was inspired by "Low Effort Jam 12" to not spend much time on it. Sadly I didn't see the LEJ12 theme reveal until it was too late so withdrew this as a submission there. 

I've always wanted to write a visual novel or "choose your own adventure" style of game, so thought this would be a good start.

As I write this it is the middle of winter and Sydney is in a strict COVID lockdown. This game/story started off as a way to just mess around using Inkle and to show of some Australian slang, but it ended up turning into a bit of a reverie.

You'll probably think the writing style looks like crap.

Hope you get a bit of a laugh at least. I was going to record some voice over with my broad Aussie accent.  I might try converting it to RenPy later add in all those fancy bells and whistles..

Hope you 'ave a good one, and don't forget the aerouard!
